content: hello why lock nation things been
getting a little stale lately so I felt the spruce up was in order
got a lot of exciting things to talk about so let's jumped right into it
first order of business even if you're already a subscriber look down below it
next to the subscribe button and there's a bell icon make sure you click it so
that you get notified when I publish new episodes whole bunch people are telling
me that they don't get notifications so I guess this has been an issue for I
don't know how long so make sure you click the bell now I'm modernizing the
format of the episodes beginning with the one you're watching right now the
fancy new intro splash rebranding of logos and some new standard segments
throughout the episode as well as the introduction of the sidebar when there's
some minor details such as a paint brand or dimension for a piece I'm cutting
I'll put it in the sidebar for your convenience also you can expect some sub
series to appear while Ock editorials where I'll offer my useless opinions or
theories on something relevant to tabletop gaming while Ock likes which
will be my reviews and recommendations on a whole mix of products gains
crafting supplies that kind of thing think Oprah's Favorite Things except
that none of you will receive anything from me and due to a fascinating month
interest we're mulling over possibly doing a wife locs corner and/or a
Wheelock's corner recurring segments next if you haven't found my facebook
page it's called why LOX armory go ahead and check it out and I hope you'll
follow it I post a lot more there than just episode releases and I encourage
you to post content on it as well on that note I'd like to take what I did
back in episode 29 and make it a standard recurring practice so in each
episode I'll do a very brief showcase of something that one of you has created
that was inspired by this channel feel free to send me the pictures through the
Facebook group or post them on there or email whatever you like and I'll get
them added to the queue I'll be doing live streams on YouTube and in fact I've
already done one which was supposed to be a 5 minute technical demo but 40
people tuned in and we ended up talking for over an hour anyway these will be
mostly master classes where we build something together in real
cradle-to-grave maybe some dungeon tiles from the first few episodes of the
series or cardstock miniatures along the way I'll share tips and tricks that were
to mine you to bother with in the actual episodes these will be open to everybody
who wants to tune in for free now stick with me on the next topic I'm going to
go ahead and draw the first cut yeah yes patreon okay so while ox crafting
goods has no ads and no pre-roll and I want to keep it that way so if you've
been inspired by this channel or if you continue to be then please consider
visiting my patreon there is currently three pledge levels at $1.00 per episode
you get your name on the thank-you card which appears in every episode at $3
each you will receive a free copy of any PDF that I publish on the DMS guild at
$5 an episode you can be a sponsor so if you have a blog or a youtube channel or
you publish somewhere or you have some kind of creative hub online it will be
added to the sponsor card plus you'll be added to the queue for me to give you a
specific shout out in a short plug to hopefully direct some traffic your way
note that regardless of the pledge level you will only ever be charged for the
main series of the crafting vid tutorials not any of the side series or
miniseries that I mentioned earlier those are just extra proceeds allow me
to continuously improve the channel and therefore the original content I can get
to you alternatively if you don't want to be a
patron but want to make an easy one-time contribution then check out my two
modules published on the DMS guild they're pay what you want so you can put
some cash in the can and get a full dungeon module out of it and of course
if you cannot or do not want to do any of that perfectly fine and I really
appreciate you as a viewer anyway so welcome to the New World Order and I'll
see you guys around real soon let me get back to work
you
